tool_description: Discover the world of education with the University Data API, offering comprehensive information on over 1000 universities globally. From top-ranking institutions to campuses and budgets, easily integrate with our API endpoints to access a wealth of university details for your application.
name: University Data
title: University Data

api_list.name: Get Top 'n' Universities by Ranking
api_list.description: List top 'n' universities by World ranking (if available). Maximum 100.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://university-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/rank/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://university-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/rank/{count}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of Universities by Country
api_list.description: Get list of Universities by Country Name. Example, "India"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://university-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/country/India"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get University by Name
api_list.description: REST api to get University details by provided name of the university. Example,  "University of Calcutta"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://university-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/name/Bombay"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://university-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/name/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
